alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 10:53AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: Light rain will change to light snow between 11am and 1pm. Light snow will continue through the afternoon, possibly falling moderately at times. Visibilities will likely be reduced to one half to one mile at times this afternoon. Temperatures will drop to around freezing, allowing for snow to accumulate on untreated roads. Up to an inch of snowfall is likely across this area, particularly across the highest elevations, before ending late this afternoon. Be prepared for snow and slush covered roads, particularly secondary and elevated roadways for the afternoon commute. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
